reviewText:
Delightful book for grandchild who loves dogs.
This gift  brought lots of smiles and hugs.
Would recommend as a good "reading and cuddling with grandma" book!
I just wish it were a bit longer.  22 min running time.  Jingle responds to the DVD.  We love it!

This is a very sweet and cute story.  My 5 year old daughter loves to sit with Jingle and watch this movie alot.  I love that it brings back memories of watching the old style of animation like "Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer".  It will definately become a great memory for future years to come for my daughter!

If you're looking for a frenetic Cartoon Network show with ugly characters and rapid fire gags, forget it.  "Jingle All the Way" is warm and gentle which, come to think of it, is just how I like my Christmastide to be.
My daughter absolutely loves this movie!!!
Wish more like this for little ones.
I LOVE the Hallmark Jingle series of animated stuffed animals and story books - these DVD's are a great addition to the set.
Very enjoyable .... for youngsters of any age .... takes me back to the 1960's .... when Rudolph first came out!  Magical!!

I got this movie a couple of months back. I haven't watched it yet, but, I have seen the Christmas star one. I loved it! It's very cute. I bought a two movie pack and it had " Jingle All the Way " on it, I'm giving this one to my 10 year old cousin for her birthday in March. I'm sure she will love this.
WAITING A LIFETIME IT SEEMS FOR IT TO BE ON SALE.A MUST OWN AND FOR ALL AGES.THERE ARE A LITTLE HEART FELT MOMENTS BUT ALSO FILLED WITH HOPE AND SMILES.
Cute move Especially when you have Jingel the Husky pup. My 1 year old Cuddles up with the puppy when it on.
